remarks: This theorem proves the Stone Weierstrass theorem for the non-trivial case in which T is nonempty.  The proof follows [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 89 (through page 92).  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
